main: I can sense immense courage from you, warrior. We the people of Kinta are merely craftsmen and farmers, yet those terrible demon brothers enact their nonsensical laws on us and take our food as tax. Will you be our deliverance?
branch_1: Then please, but be vigilant. Those two can be crafty together.
branch_2: Is that so. It seems I've regrettably been misinformed.
